pages.text: $(li)Piglins are neutral creatures that can be found over the Nether.$(br)$(li)These creatures will become hostile to you if they see you while you are not wearing at least one piece of Golden Armor.$(br)$(li)You can trade with a Pigling throwing Gold Ingots near to it.
They will held a Golden Sword or a Crossbow. They may drop their held weapon on death.
